My name is Jennifer,

For the past couple of years, I’ve earned a B.S. degree at University of California, San Diego for Cognitive Science w/Human Computer Interactions. I’ve self taught myself photoshop and html/css in order to build websites. And I’m proud to say I still haven’t drank a single cup of coffee in order to power through my day. But more importantly, I’ve learned how to collaborate with developers and communicate deliverables to stakeholders.

Motorcycle Rider | Craft Beer | Gamer | Urban Explorer | Creative Nomad | Foodie
